comments.author: Shannon
comments.content: Yum,this looks good.  Beet salad is frequently on our table in the summer, and the recipe is similar to this except it has chopped shallots and no tomatoes.  I think the tomatoes are an excellent addition though.  Thanks!

comments.author: Lea
comments.content: Mmmmmmm! I think it would look exceptionally beautiful with some of my yellow heirloom tomatoes. This will be on the table very soon!

comments.author: Sarah
comments.content: I loved this! I had increased the serving size to 8 so, I cut the butter in half and also cut down the lemon juice to a generous 1/4 cup. I also didn't have real chile peppers, so I substituted powdered chipolte chili. Delicious!
